trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of a key container within the CSP containing the key pair used to generate a strong name.
When building a strong-named assembly, the author must supply either this attribute or <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyKeyFileAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Lorsque vous générez un assembly avec nom fort, l’auteur doit fournir cet attribut ou <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyKeyFileAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: An example of the syntax is `[assembly:AssemblyKeyNameAttribute("myContainer")]`.
trans-unit.target: Est un exemple de la syntaxe `[assembly:AssemblyKeyNameAttribute("myContainer")]`.

trans-unit.source: The classes in `System.Runtime.CompilerServices` are intended for use by compilers only.
trans-unit.target: Les classes de `System.Runtime.CompilerServices` sont destinés uniquement par des compilateurs.

trans-unit.source: Do not use them unless you are building a compiler.
trans-unit.target: Ne les utilisez pas, sauf si vous générez un compilateur.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics".
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, consultez la documentation du Common Language Infrastructure (CLI), en particulier « Partition II : Metadata Definition et Semantics ».

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: La documentation est disponible en ligne. Consultez [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) sur MSDN et [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) sur le site web d’Ecma International.

trans-unit.source: The name of the container containing the key pair.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyKeyNameAttribute" /> class with the name of the container holding the key pair used to generate a strong name for the assembly being attributed.
Gets the name of the container having the key pair that is used to generate a strong name for the attributed assembly.
A string containing the name of the container that has the relevant key pair.
trans-unit.target: Chaîne contenant le nom de conteneur qui comprend la paire de clés appropriées.
